basic.description: This course examines current issues in intelligence, creativity, talent development, and giftedness. Course topics include theories of intelligence, the four P's of creativity, conceptions of giftedness, and why certain groups of students are underrepresented in gifted programs.
basic.subject: MHS
basic.title: Introduction to the Psychology of the Gifted

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: Senior standing and 3.0 GPA in major.
